name: ServiceNow-CICD-App-Rollback
description: Initiate a rollback of a specified application to a specified version.
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: scope
inputs.label: Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if sys_id is not specified. The scope name of the application to rollback.

inputs.name: sysId
inputs.label: sys_id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required if scope is not specified. The sys_id of the application to rollback.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Required. Expected rollback version. This version is compared to the version that is contained in the last rollback context, if they don't match, the method returns an error.
